skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quiz of the day kids
Developer Terms of Use
des:
> What is Quiz of the Day Kids?

Quiz of the Day Kids is a quiz designed to test and add to the knowledge of your kids by means of questions based on different subjects. It will ask you 5 questions daily, correct answers to which can earn you points. 

> Topics and Levels

There are two categories (3-5 years and 6-8 years) which involve 2 levels each. You can choose the levels of difficulty and the age group as per your convenience.

All the levels will include mixed questions from topics listed down below as per the difficulty level.

1. Animals and Plants and seasons 
2. Our world
3. Colours and Shapes
4. Food
5. Safety 
6. Etiquette 
7. Entertainment- Books, movies,cartoons
8. Numbers and math for quiz
9. Sports for kids
10. Words and vocabulary for kids
11. General

> Who is Mr. ZOZO?

Mr. Zozo is a character that has been built to engage children and not make it a rather boring exercise for them. He is the quiz master and all interactions made with kids are by Mr. Zozo.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
